decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location Plan, 1134BF-LP revision 1 Shopfront plan, 1134BF-LP revision 1 Illustrative Plan and Planning Statement prepared by I D Planning dated November 2015 and received on 03/12/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - No fans, louvres, ducts or other external plant shall be installed without the prior approval of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 4 - The use hereby permitted for betting shop purposes shall not be carried on outside the following times 8am to 10pm Monday to Saturday and 9am to 10pm on Sundays and Bank Holidays.
description: Change of use to betting shop (sui generis) and new shop front
